reviewers.description: List of possible reviewers by their Gitlab usernames (e.g. `first.last-company`).

labels.description: Label mappings to associate with the MR/PRs created. The keys are the label names, and the values are the corresponding Gitlab label names.

working_dir.description: Working directory, can be a relative path or an absolute path. If not set, the current working directory will be used.

assignee.description: Default assignee for the MR/PRs created.
